original_solution_mapping.L1: On Trey's list there are 7 + 1 + 4 things to do = <<7+1+4=12>>12 things to do in total.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Each thing takes 10 minutes to do, so 10 minutes x 12 things = <<10*12=120>>120 minutes.
original_solution_mapping.L3: An hour has 60 minutes in it, so 120 minutes / 60 minutes in an hour = <<120/60=2>>2 total hours it will take Trey to complete his list.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 818.
    Returns: the total number of hours it will take to complete Trey's list.
    """
    # L1
    clean_house_items = 7 # 7 things to do to clean the house
    shower_items = 1 # 1 thing to do to take a shower
    dinner_items = 4 # 4 things to do to make dinner
    total_items = clean_house_items + shower_items + dinner_items

    # L2
    time_per_item_minutes = 10 # takes 10 minutes to do
    total_minutes = time_per_item_minutes * total_items

    # L3
    minutes_per_hour = 60 # WK
    total_hours = total_minutes / minutes_per_hour

    # FA
    answer = total_hours
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: On Trey's list there are {clean_house_items} + {shower_items} + {dinner_items} things to do = <<{clean_house_items}+{shower_items}+{dinner_items}={total_items}>>{total_items} things to do in total.
Each thing takes {time_per_item_minutes} minutes to do, so {time_per_item_minutes} minutes x {total_items} things = <<{time_per_item_minutes}*{total_items}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes.

An hour has {minutes_per_hour} minutes in it, so {total_minutes} minutes / {minutes_per_hour} minutes in an hour = <<{total_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} total hours it will take Trey to complete his list.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: On Trey's list there are 7 + 7 + 4 things to do = <<7+7+4=18>>18 things to do in total.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Each thing takes 10 minutes to do, so 10 minutes x 18 things = <<10*18=180>>180 minutes.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: An hour has 60 minutes in it, so 180 minutes / 60 minutes in an hour = <<180/60=3>>3 total hours it will take Trey to complete his list.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'clean_house_items' (7) was used instead of 'shower_items' (1).
